trans-unit.source: To prevent unauthorized users from registering themselves by using the link http:///p/register, you can protoct this URL with HTTP Basic authentication.

seg-source.mrk: To prevent unauthorized users from registering themselves by using the link http:///p/register, you can protoct this URL with HTTP Basic authentication.

target.mrk: Um zu verhindern, dass unautorisierte Personen über den Link http:///p/register einen Nutzer registrieren, können Sie das Aufrufen dieser URL durch eine HTTP Basic Authentifizierung schützen.

trans-unit.source: Edit the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/web.xml </kbd> and add the following lines to its end before the XML tag <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></web-app></kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: Edit the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/web.xml </kbd> and add the following lines to its end before the XML tag <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></web-app></kbd>:

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie hierzu die Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/web.xml</kbd> in einem Texteditor und fügen Sie die folgenden Zeilen am Ende der Datei, aber vor dem schließenden XML-Tag <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"></web-app></kbd> ein:

trans-unit.source: This configuration ensures only Tomcat users with the role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> can access the resource <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/p/register</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: This configuration ensures only Tomcat users with the role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> can access the resource <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/p/register</kbd>.

target.mrk: Sie haben nun konfiguriert, dass nur Tomcat-Nutzer mit der Rolle <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> Zugriff auf die Ressource <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/p/register</kbd> bekommen.

trans-unit.source: The role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> needs to be defined and assigned to an existing Tomcat user account.

seg-source.mrk: The role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> needs to be defined and assigned to an existing Tomcat user account.

target.mrk: Sie müssen jedoch noch die Rolle <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> definieren sowie einen Nutzer anlegen und dem Nutzer diese Rolle zuweisen.

trans-unit.source: To do so, edit the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/tomcat-users.xml</kbd> and replace its content with the following lines:

seg-source.mrk: To do so, edit the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/tomcat-users.xml</kbd> and replace its content with the following lines:

target.mrk: Öffnen Sie hierzu die Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf/tomcat-users.xml</kbd> in einem Texteditor und ersetzen Sie den Inhalt der Datei mit den folgenden Zeilen:

trans-unit.source: These lines define the role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> and create a user with the username <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">signavio</kbd>, the password <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">signavio</kbd> and the role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: These lines define the role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> and create a user with the username <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">signavio</kbd>, the password <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">signavio</kbd> and the role <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd>.

target.mrk: Diese Zeilen definieren die Rolle <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> und erstellen einen Nutzer mit dem Nutzernamen <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">signavio</kbd> und dem Passwort <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">signavio</kbd>, dem die Rolle <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">register</kbd> zugeordnet wurde.

trans-unit.source: Please customize the attribute values for <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">username</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">password</kbd> and share this information only with authorized persons who are allowed to register new users in the Signavio system.

seg-source.mrk: Please customize the attribute values for <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">username</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">password</kbd> and share this information only with authorized persons who are allowed to register new users in the Signavio system.

target.mrk: Ändern Sie die Attribute <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">username</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">password</kbd> und geben Sie diese Informationen nur an autorisierte Personen weiter, die neue Nutzer in Ihrem System anlegen dürfen.
